thread.title: High Protein, Low Fat Pet Food E - Commerce
thread.title_full: High Protein, Low Fat Pet Food E - Commerce

title: High Protein, Low Fat Pet Food E - Commerce
text: Questions Business Summary Trademarked product that has all of today's buzzwords encompassed in one product offering - no artificial colors, flavors, high protein, gluten free, soy free, no binding agents, truly a healthy snack for your pet! Full turnkey website with requisite Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter, etc...social media presence. Nice roster of satisfied customers included. Ideal for someone that has an existing holding in the space or someone that wants an opportunity to focus on full time for business development. NDA is required for first round due diligence package on file with the Broker and for the subject URL. Seller is negotiable and willing to listen to offers of all kinds. Inventory: Included in asking price Facilities: Relocatable opportunity anywhere in the USA. (Home Based) Competition: Pet food in general is a competitive industry but with custom formulations and a trademarked product there is a highly salable product and Company up for grabs. Growth & Expansion: Continue marketing and take the initial infrastructure that the Seller has created and build the customer base. Financing: $64k Cash Down, $2,500 / Month for 30 Months at 0%! Home-Based: This business is Home-Based Financials
